nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats
Interface StatisticalFinancesService

All Superinterfaces:
Service, StatisticalService
All Known Subinterfaces:
StatisticalFinancesServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
StatisticalFinancesServiceImpl, StatisticalFinancesServiceSecurity
public interface StatisticalFinancesService
extends StatisticalService

Service interface for Finances Statistics. It shows the in- and outgoing finances for system accounts.

Author:
rinke
